devdoc.details: This contract does not support BNB.

getPoolAssetReserve(address,address).details: Get the Amount of the asset in the risk fund for the specific pool.

getPoolReserve(address).details: Get pool reserve by pool id.

params._accessControl: Address of the access control contract.
params._amountOutMin: Min amount out for the pancake swap.
params._minAmountToConvert: Asset should be worth of min amount to convert into base asset
params._pancakeSwapRouter: Address of the pancake swap router.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amountOutMin: Min amount out for the pancake swap.

params._pancakeSwapRouter: Address of the pancake swap router.

swapAllPoolsAssets().details: Swap assets of all pools into base asset's tokens.

swapPoolsAssets((string,address,address,.details: Swap assets of selected pools into base tokens.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: Amount to be transferred to auction contract.

updateAssetsState(address,address).details: Update the reserve of the asset for the specific pool after transferring to risk fund.
